description: This is a sample R program that calculates the sum of two numbers.
code:
num1 <- 5
num2 <- 10
sum <- num1 + num2
print(sum)
instructions: Install R programming language and RStudio if not already installed.
Open RStudio and create a new script file.
Copy and paste the provided R code into the script file.
Run the code in RStudio to see the sum of two numbers printed in the console.
